body:
@OverLordGoldDragon congrats!! 🥇 and many thanks for this 

@changhongw @lylyhan @rastegah please see above and team up with us to get this merged

issue.title: Revamp `xi_max`

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body: It's too low. Analyticity is worse with greater, but poor coverage beats no coverage. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16495490/126914345-3e67e4ed-e8c4-48ac-99ef-1b2f7193e7c1.png) (Note: LP sum images assume #765 merged)
